caption.p: Anti-viral test. (i) HCoV-OC43 anti-viral assay plate layout in human hepatoma (Huh7) cells incubated with different agents, (ii) A decrease in viral foci assayed by antibody staining, (iii) percentage of inhibition, (iv) dose response of RDV, (v) the number of spots per well (A, B, C), (vi) EC 50 values.
